case.state: I need your help, ~human~. I'm here looking for something called... Fire Emblem™: Three Houses for Nintendo Switch? Apparently it's available for $59.99 at most video game retailers?
Hi, I'm Leonie Pinelli - Captain Jeralt's first and greatest apprentice! Is a hot spring really the best place for a game of 'poker'?
Hi, I'm Leonie Pinelli - Captain Jeralt's first and greatest apprentice! Is a library really the best place for a game of strip poker?
Hi, I'm Leonie Pinelli - Captain Jeralt's first and greatest apprentice! I heard there was a game of poker?
Bernie, I need your help. You have a Nintendo Switch™, right? Do you have a copy of Fire Emblem™: Three Houses for Nintendo Switch?
Haven't seen any Ruby, no. Are you sure you're not lost... Weiss?
Are you trying to recruit people to your mercenary band, or something? Because I'll have to decline.
(Wait, is that who I think it is? What's Bernadetta doing here?)
Well, she certainly knows how to travel in style!
Woah, portal magic? Didn't expect to see a mage like that here.
Well, aren't you just the cutest little mage! You from a school of sorcery or something, Akko?
(Well, she certainly looks aggressive. What's with that getup? That crown is... odd.)
Well, you're certainly dressed for the occasion, Catboy.
Are you lost, Dawn? This doesn't look like the sort of place an innocent girl like you should be.
'Fries'? I've never tried any myself, but they sound great!
(Okay, this guy just reeks of sleaze. Definitely one of those snake oil salesmen that kept visiting my village.)
Nice to meet you, Haru! (Wow, she looks so... fluffy!)
Nice to meet you, Hanako. I'm Leonie. Are you ready to play?
Well, Jura's certainly dressed to impress!
Nice dress, Jura. You're definitely some kind of noblewoman, right?
Hm? Oh, I didn't hear you come in. Nice to meet you, I'm Leonie. What's your name? ... Yeah, you, with the uniform!
Who names a sword after themselves? I don't go around calling my lances 'Leonie Jr' or anything...
Right... try not to blow anything up inside, okay?
Oh, great... one of those kinds of mages...
"N"? What kind of name is "N"? I'm gonna call you... Cappy.
Pro Hero, huh? Does that kind of job pay well?
Woah, are those wings real? What kind of opponent did I get put up against?
Oh, I like your armor Pyrrha! Very... form fitting.
Your armor's not very... well, it leaves a lot of skin exposed, doesn't it Pyrrha?
You have to play a game to get home? You sure it's this game? You look like you'd be better off playing tic-tac-toe or something.
You're certainly bringing the right energy, Saki.
Hey there, Saki right? Welcome to game night!
Nice to... meet you, Shimakaze? Is that little thing an actual cannon?
(That girl is bright pink. .. Okay, don't say anything, that'd be rude.)
You look like you know how to fight. Want to go a few rounds after this game, Videl?
An Arch-Wizard? Now that sounds impressive!
(Why am I getting some very weird feelings with Zone around? It's not her apperance, so what...?)
Well... Hello Raynor, nice to meet you!
Looks like we have a full house tonight!
Well, fancy seeing you guys here.
Hey, is this some kind of secret academy club meeting?
Are we... going to talk about this back at Garreg Mach?
Bernadetta? Is that you? You look... more mature. Like you've seen hell.
(That looks like Bernadetta, but older? Maybe it's someone else from house Varley?)
(That looks like Bernadetta, but older? Is it an older sister - or her mother?)
Bernadetta? What are you doing here? Aren't you usually stuck in your room?
Bernadetta? What a surprise seeing you here!
Professor? Oh, sorry, when I heard you were called ~human~, thought you were someone else.
Oh, you aren't... nice to meet you, ~human~. I thought you were my Professor for a second.
Huh, what're the odds that two people named Leonie show up to play? What a coincidence.
Another guy named Claude? What, are you some kind of prankster too?
Woah, you're... you're really going for the whole Edelgard look, aren't you?
Woah, you must idolise Edelgard or something to copy her whole look.
I may like Captain Jeralt, but that doesn't mean I want to copy him exactly. Unlike you and Edelgard, it seems...
~Player~.... that name seems... oddly familiar.
Even if you had good intentions, I'm not going to respect you calling yourself after the captain, because you aren't him.
(Some of the people here look... familiar, but not? Like they're from another time?)
(Some of the people here look oddly familiar, but... are they even from Fódlan?)
What's "Stone Free"? I don't see anything. Am I supposed to?
I don't see anything, Jolyne. Am I supposed to?
Nice to meet you, Komi. I hope we get along just fine!
Okay, nicknaming people is more my classmate Dorothea's thing, but I'm still going to call you that and see if I can make it stick.
"Monika"? Oh, never mind, you aren't- forget it, let's play.
(For a second, I thought she was going to be a different Monika.)
Is that a talking butterfly? (It better keep its distance.)
Of all the things to play cards against... I wasn't expecting that.
Is that- no, sorry, my mistake. You looked so similar to Lady Rhea that... nevermind
Oh! Palutena, was it? I mistook you for someone else. Almost gave me a heart attack.
Don't take this the wrong way, but, are you meant to be here-- what was it, "Magma Grunt"?
Great! Let's get this game started!
Even I need a break from training now and again. This seems like a good way to unwind, right?
I haven't had a lot of chances to play cards, but I think I've got the hang of it.
It's a shame this isn't a real game of poker. If I won big, I could repay my village...
The player is bisexual or bicurious.
I can work with the cards I have.
I'll stick with this hand.
I'm fine with these cards.
You know what? I'm not swapping.
Ugh! This hand is doing nothing for me. Give me ~cards~.
This hand makes my skin crawl. Give me ~cards~.
Give me ~cards~.
I'll take ~cards~.
I can do this - give me ~cards~.
Gambit time. Swapping ~cards~.
To start with, I'll swap ~cards~.
Dealer! Give me ~cards~.
It all comes down to this. Give me ~cards~.
Dealer, give me ~cards~. I'm counting on you.
I'll keep it simple! ~Cards~!
I've got another option. Swapping ~cards~.
Time to turn the tables - swapping ~cards~!
One wrong move and I'm finished... swapping ~cards~.
Dealer, give me ~cards~.
Give me ~cards~.
I'll keep it simple and swap ~cards~.
I'll swap out ~cards~.
Finally, my gambit paid off! My losing streak ends now.
Finally!
Pure grit!
That's the spirit!
(Woah... no way! There's no way I got this lucky!)
(Hah! There's no way I can lose with a hand like this!)
Ouch! That's not good...
Ugh... I'll manage!
(Woah... no way! There's no way I got this lucky!)
(Hah! There's no way I can lose with a hand like this!)
Okay, this hand is... It's a Killing Edge in card form!
I'll... manage.
Ouch! That's not good...
(Nice, my hard work finally paid off with this hand. )
(Wow! My good luck charm really paid off with this hand!)
Alright, I've been thinking, and I've settled on my mercenary title. Ready? ... The Blade Breaker II. What do you all think?

state.text: I want to be a top-tier mercenary, like Captain Jeralt the Blade Breaker. For my title, I was thinking... The Raging Bear. Well?

case.state: If I want to be as good as the Blade Breaker, I need my own tough-sounding title. I was thinking... The Executioner. Well?
Let me ask you all something. What do you think makes a great mercenary?
Sweet! I mean... it's a decent start.
Not bad, not bad.
Alright, play it cool...
Let's put it to the test.
Alright, this'll do just fine.
Let's see this hand in action.
I can work with these.
This hand isn't too bad.
This round could probably go either way.
This might all come down to luck.
Is there any point even saying what my hand is? We're going to find out in a second anyway...
Come on, give me a lucky break here.
Well- I'll manage, at least.
Let's see, if it goes like this... it should be okay.
This hand isn't too bad, but I'll need something better to stay in.
Well, damn. I guess my good luck charm finally wore off.
Damn! I really thought I could hang in there, but I guess my luck ran out.
Damn, I got cocky. This probably won't go well.
Ouch! That's not good...
What?! What even are these cards?
Oh, come on!
What the heck is with these cards?
Ugh... I'll manage!
(This is bad...)
Oh, come on! I need better luck than this to stay in...
(This is bad, real bad.)
One bad round, and I'm finished.
Let's see this hand in action.
Guess I'd better pack it in...
This is reminding me of that time I missed three attacks in a row... not my best moment, and I got hurt for it.
Well, my school is a little different from yours. I'm training to be a warrior, and I'll probably get roped into working for the Leicester Alliance - but I really want to be a freelancer.

state.text: Oh, I'm not really big on romance and... dating. Pass?
People always talk about romance, but, honestly, I'm not interested in that kind of stuff.

case.state: To be honest, I'm not one who's big on flirting. You two probably know as much as I do about that.

("Conk"? Did he mean to say "Cock"?)
Damn, that's gotta hurt.
If it's alright with you, ~raynor~, I'd rather not talk about war while I'm here. I came her to get away from all that.
If you don't mind, ~raynor~, I'd rather leave talk about war at the door. I came here to get away from all of that.
Well, my company is mostly made up of my classmates from Golden Deer house. We've known each other for years now, so we trust each other.
That's the same for me, actually! I'm going to ask my Professor if I can switch my study focus to horseback and bows. They wanted me to focus on lances instead?
A race? You're on. I'll have you know I'm one of the fastest students in Golden Deer!
That's a deep question, Yuelia. I would go with what my gut tells me.
A race? You're on. I'll have you know I was one of the fastest students in Golden Deer!
I'm going to be a renowned mercenary, just like Captain Jeralt! I just need to think of a title for myself...
I'll be known all across Fódlan as a great warrior, a mercenary like the Blade Breaker himself!
Most of my reading is to do with my training. Usually tips on using a bow, or riding on horseback. Or both.
Most of the things I read are for my classes. I haven't read a novel in a while.
Oh? Got a sweetheart waiting for you to finish school? Good for you, Hermione.
Fancy your hand at writing, Hanako? If you have the urge to do it, you should! I'd love to read whatever tale you can invent.
If you think you can write, you should do it Hanako! I'd love to read a good tale you come up with.
When I go into the village to buy something, I usually get all my chores done in one go. It saves me from having to make a round trip!
I never really had a lot of spending money back in my village, but I used to enjoy talking to all the people.
Shamir, are you still going to be running that bow seminar later?
Shamir, are you still running the seminar on bows and lances later?
Looks like we've got a ghost here tonight. But I heard you're from a family of mediums, Mia? You should be great at talking to ~ghost_tgt~.
I heard Mia's from a family of spirit mediums, so you should have no trouble talking to ~ghost_tgt~, right?
What, a pirate with two peg legs? Wouldn't that make it hard to stand up?

state.text: You know, that actually sounds... interesting, Aella. Not that I'd actually do it!
You aren't the only one that's thought about that, Aella. I-I mean, I would probably never do it.

case.state: I've always been partial to a good Vegetable Stir-Fry. Just, not when Flayn is the one cooking - that girl nearly set the kitchen on fire using veggies.
I love a good King of Beasts Steak. You need to kill a Duscur bear to get it, which is a big task, but the end result is delicious!

condition.saying: The Joestar spirit will get me through this!

case.state: What is that, a star tattoo? I guess it suits you!
Is that a star tattoo? Wait, no, is that a birthmark? I didn't know you could get birthmarks like that.
Oh, she doesn't look too happy about that one, Wheatley...
So you're the infamous Twisted Fate. I heard about you before the game, you know. Don't try any funny tricks now.
Oh, I'm not really big on romance and... dating. Pass?
People always talk about romance, but, honestly, I'm not interested in that kind of stuff.
I think that's a bit disrespectful, claiming to be a goddess...
A goddess? You? Yeah right.
Hey, no need to run your mouth and pretend to be a goddess. That's disrespectful.
I don't get a lot of time to play sports, but I'm a pretty good runner. Although, I guess you could count 'sparring' as a sport.
Oh, I... I hardly ever spend time naked. I like having the feeling of wearing something, even if it's just my underwear.
My trip was pretty simple... once I figured out where I was going. There was this thing called an Outrealm Gate, and it just... let me come here.
You can only cast explosion? But surely if you're versed in Reason you can at least cast Fire as well?
You can only cast an explosion spell? Surely you can cast something else, like Fire, at the very least?
You know, ~raynor~, just because I like you doesn't mean I'm going to go easy on you!
So you're an actual ghost, Polly? A ghost that parties? ... What's that like?
So, Polly, you... you're a ghost? A party ghost? This is just some kind of magic trick, isn't it?
So you're an actual ghost, Spooky? A ghost that runs a haunted mansion? ... You're just pulling my leg, aren't you?
So you're an actual ghost, ~ghost_tgt~? What's... what's that like?
(Sounds like Bernadetta.) I would check on them now and again, but leave them be for the most part.
Wait, we're not allowed to bet actual money here, are we? ... are we?
Hold on, I thought one of the rules was we couldn't bet actual money? ... if we could, I'd take that bet.
A giant frog? How big are we talking? Ten feet tall?
I've fought some giant beasts in my time, but I don't think I've ever heard of a giant frog...
I've fought some giant animals in my time, but I don't think I've ever seen a giant frog...
Me and my friends have to fight demonic beasts on a regular basis. We've gotten pretty good at coordinating our attacks to break through its armor.
My class and I have to fight giant beasts - bigger than a house! I'll have to keep score of how many giant birds we fight, since we always seem to run into them...
"France"? I've never even heard of a place called France.
"France" doesn't happen to be anywhere near Fódlan, does it?
I enjoy spending time in nature - but, probably for different reasons than you do...
Right... Okay. So, my question is: What are duel monsters?
A net? For cabbage? What are you talking about, Megumin?
A net for cabbage? Is that some local slang from your village, Megumin?
I... wow, I don't even know how to respond to that, Miss Pauling.
Well... that's certainly a gruesome story. I've never dealt with anything quite like that.

condition.saying: small lady with a big hammer

case.state: Unless you mean that time Claude made Lysithea wield a hammer as a practical joke, I don't know what you mean.
Can't say I have, Lux. Why, are they looking for someone in particular?
Oh yeah, it's my birthday today. It wouldn't surprise me if my professor brings me something later - they've been doing that for all the students.
Oh right, it's my birthday today. I haven't really planned anything special for it... I'll probably just do my usual routine later.
Say Amy, where're you keeping that hammer of yours? It just sort of... disappears sometimes?
Hey Amy, where do you hide that hammer of yours? It just kind of... vanishes when I'm not looking?
I hope I don't lose, because I'm not used to doing that sort of thing in front of others, either...

state.text: Oh, I'm not really into the whole 'romance' thing. I know other girls my age are, but not me.
To be honest Ayano, I'm not one who's big on dating. You probably know more about that than I do, really.

case.state: I'm guessing it's not the same Professor I know, is it?
Is ~bernie~ alright? She's just... standing there. Did she faint standing up?
~Bernie~, you there? You're just standing there... wait, did you faint standing up?
I don't think any of us are from around here...
I don't think we're allowed to grab our stuff after we've taken it off...
I'd be down for a snack. Any chance we can waive the rules this one time?
You know, ~bernie_tgt~, we're in the same school but we don't hang out that much. How are you?
Say, ~bernie_tgt~? We should hang out more. How have you been?
You know Shamir, it feels a bit weird playing alongside one of my instructors.
You know Shamir, you're not a teacher, but you're still one of my instructors. Isn't this a bit weird?
So ~human~, you have white hair? Is there any particular story behind that?
Hey ~human~, your hair is a pretty interesting color. Have you always had white hair?
So ~human~, who did you come here to meet? Girls? Or guys?
So ~human~, who did you come here to look at? Girls? Or guys?
Don't things seem a little bit unbalanced tonight? Us girls vs ~human~, the only boy here.
Hey, don't things seem a little off here? ~Human~ is the only guy at our table.
So what is this, a girl's night out?
Is this the sort of thing you girls usually get up to?
So, this is a women's night out, right? Not really a typical girly activity.
Oh, right! Happy birthday, ~bernie~! Hope you got something you wanted this year.
Hey ~fighter_target~, I know you're good at sewing, but how would you handle... fighting in close quarters?
Hey ~fighter_target~, I know you're good with a bow, but how would you handle a melee scrap?
(While I'm here, maybe I should ask ~fighter_target~ for combat advice?)
(Huh, maybe I should ask ~fighter_target~ for some combat tips? While I still have the chance.)
Hey ~fighter_target~, you look like you're good in a fight. Any tips for fighting up close?
Hey ~fighter_target~, you get into fights, right? Got any tips for close range?
Paint a picture, ~rivalry_target~, it'll last longer.
What are you staring at, ~rivalry_target~?
What's wrong, ~rivalry_target~? Scared you might lose this round?
Don't underestimate me.
I'll turn the tables sooner or later.
Back home, I always trained alone. No one else in my village wanted to be a mercenary.
This isn't a very 'girly' activity, is it? Well, too late for that anyway.
I wonder how much traffic this place gets? Could be a good way to meet all sorts of travellers.
(Crap, I forgot about one of my duties back home. I'd better sort that out quick when I get back.)
Anyone suddenly feeling a little self conscious, or am I just getting the jitters?
I can fight under any conditions. Well, this isn't really fighting, but it is a competition!
Anyone ever tried bear meat? I've heard it's quite chewy, but rich in protein.
I don’t care what you all think of me. I just don’t want to lose to you.
Don't forget to do some stretches, don't let your muscles settle down when you have to stand still.
Never been one to back down. Wonder what Jeralt would have done in a game like this?
(Haven't sent a letter to mom since the war started. I should probably change that when I get back)
I wonder if they do any other game nights here? Maybe real poker? I'd be down for that. 20,000 gold buy-in, anyone?
Never been one to back down. Wonder what Jeralt would do in a game like this?
(I wonder how mom's doing back home? I hope the letter I sent reaches her.)
I wonder if they do any other game nights here? Dice, maybe?
Well thanks ~bernie~, that's a real confidence booster.
Hey, don't talk bad about Captain Jeralt! What do you have about men being in charge, anyway?

state.text: Oh, Captain Jeralt's not my teacher, but I did apprentice under him before going to the academy.
Yep! Captain Jeralt took me in as his apprentice, and my village helped me get in to the academy so that I could get the best training possible!

case.state: I guess I could- no, I'd rather lose than take off the necklace.
This necklace is too special to me. I'll just... take off my bra.
Captain Jeralt made this necklace for me a long time ago. It's a reminder of where I came from. So I'm keeping it on.
This necklace is a reminder of where I came from - Captain Jeralt made it. I'll keep it on.

state.text: Guess I lost. Well Cynthia, the short of it is, I'm training to be a mercenary, like Captain Jeralt.

case.state: Let's not mention this back at the Officer's Academy, alright?
We aren't going to talk about this back at school, are we?
Let's not mention this back at Garreg Mach, alright?
We aren't going to talk about this back home, are we?
Well, I guess it had to be me.
I guess this will even things out, at least.
I didn't come here to lose, but I guess winning won't be a breeze either.
Looks like it's my turn again.
Looks like I didn't keep the lead for long.
Darn it. Wish I could have kept my actual clothes on for a bit longer.
Hells—looks like it's my turn again.
After this I won't be taking any more off, I swear.
I'll get through this - I'm quite stubborn.
Damn, I thought I could get away without taking off my shirt.
Dang, Almost got away with it.
If it had to be someone I guess I just drew the short straw.
Don't get comfortable; I didn't come here to lose!
It's only a small setback; I'll do better next round.
My turn again? Already?
Darn it, it'll be hard to get the lead back now.
Well, I'm running out of small things to get rid of.
Hells—my turn again? Really?
Dealer, are you rigging things against me?
Oh for- no, it's fine, I'll do it.
Oh, come on! Me, really? Again?
Dastards... Fine, I'll do it.
Very funny. You'll be sorry in a minute.
You just want to see a fit girl in the buff, don't you, ~human~?
It just had to be me, didn't it?
Beginner's lack-of-luck, I guess.
Don't get cocky, I'll come back from this.
Really? My turn again?
I must've put on my lucky necklace on wrong, because this isn't right.
Well, looks like I'm still leading - in last place.
Of all the people here, it had to be me again?
This just isn't my night.
You've got to be kidding.
It's doing great. Thanks for your help, by the way.
Wait, your entire world didn't have any men? That's ridiculous!
Just giving you a bit of breathing room, ~bernie~. It'd be mean to force you to go first, after all!
The captain taught me the basics, and now I'm pushing myself to get even better!
He's not my only mentor at the Officer's Academy, so I'm getting a good chance to study a bunch of different fighting styles.
I didn't accidentally get invited to a men-only table, did I?
So, did I get invited to the wrong table? Why am I the only woman here?
Do I really have to go topless... out here? In the street?
Do I really need to go topless out here, in the street? Fine.
Do I really have to go topless... out here? In an alley?
Do I really need to go topless out here? Fine.
Normally I'd be changing into my armor in a room like this...
I wouldn't mind getting changed in a place like this, but stripping down...
Here goes my top, too...
And here goes my leather.
I probably should've kept my shield on last round...
I don't wear much armor, because I'm better at avoiding hits, but I couldn't dodge this one.
Guess you'll get to see my abs sooner, rather than later...
Well, time to lose these shorts.
These shorts are actually really good for when I'm out hunting—there's less fabric to get caught on a bush.
I guess I have no choice, so, there go my shorts.
Don't know how Hilda goes into battle wearing a skirt—that feels like a recipe for disaster.
Goodbye gloves, goodbye pauldrons.
You'll be missed, gloves. Not going to be pulling any strings tonight.
There's nothing wrong if I take off my shield as well as my gloves, is there?

state.text: Jeralt used to wear armor similar to this. Don't need to wear a full suit of armor as long as you have something protective.
Captain Jeralt showed me the importance of keeping a shield on you, just in case you ever get into a scrap at a moment's notice.

case.state: Fine, if you really want to see them, I guess I'll give you a look.
All I can ask is, try not to stare too hard.
All eyes on me now? You don't have to stare at me...
Let me guess, you've all been waiting for this?
Alright, here I go. I'm... not ashamed of my own body.
I'm not ashamed of what I have. Take a good look... I mean, if you want.
I've got no shame or fear about myself.
I guess I'll get rid of my jacket, just to start with.
Don't worry, I'm just starting with my jacket.
Don't get too excited. It's just my jacket.
It's just my jacket for now. And I wasn't even wearing it on my shoulders!
Do you mind if I take my socks off at the same time?
My socks are caught in my boots - well, off they go as well.
There go my boots. Oh, and my socks for good measure.
Well, time to go topless.
Guess it's time to show you my abs.
I guess I have no choice, so...
First the jacket, now the gloves.
These gloves have served me well. Goodbye, gloves.
Well, there goes my dress, too.
And here goes... the dress part of my uniform.
I probably should've kept my socks on last round...
I don't wear much armor, because I'm better at avoiding hits, but I couldn't dodge this one.
Well, there goes my skirt, too.
First my shirt, now my bra? Fine, if you really want to see them.
All I can ask is... try not to stare.
All eyes on me now? You don't have to stare at me...
Have you been waiting for this, or what?
Alright, here I go. I'm... not ashamed of my own body.
I'm not ashamed of what I have. Take a good look... I mean, if you want.
No shame, no fear...
I'm not going to back down just because you boys are starting at me.
I'm not going to lose like this, just so you guys know.

state.text: Captain Jeralt said to never back down. So I won't. You boys won't have it easy.

case.state: Hey, I'm not giving up just because some boys are staring at me.
Oh! Well... uh, thank you, Yusuke, that's very kind of you.
Well... thank you, Yusuke. I wasn't expecting to be flattered.

(Stay calm, just be polite.)
Glad you're enjoying this, ~raynor~...
Thank you very much, ~raynor~, I... ahem.

state.text: You're a good friend, Bernie. Is it alright if I call you that?

case.state: Barefoot in... what was it, "Paris"? I'll definitely commit this to memory.
What was this city called? "Paris"? Definitely going to remember going barefoot here for a long time.
Topless in Paris... yeah, definitely going to remember this. Forever.
Topless in Paris... yeah, I'm definitely going to remember this. Probably forever.
I haven't been barefoot on a beach in years. The sand really gets everywhere, doesn't it?

state.text: Hey, is there a chair I can throw this over?

case.state: I kind of miss my old jacket, but this one's good too.
I like my jackets, but I hardly ever wear them normally. Is that weird?
It's not like I'm powerless without my gloves, you know.
Guess I may as well get rid of my armor as well, it's getting pretty heavy.
These are useful, sure, but it's quite freeing to be rid of them.
As you can see, I've not been slacking in my training. Not that I have much time to rest these days.
Can you tell that I work out? I've not spent a single day slouching in years.
Wartime doesn't give you much of an option when it comes to training, so I hope you can see how hard I've been working.
Actually... maybe I should have kept the socks on.
On second thought, that was probably a mis-step...
This feels liberating, in a way. Though I might pay for it later...
I can't believe you got me naked—I came here to win, not lose!
I should've seen this coming, but still...
Don't celebrate prematurely -- this isn't over yet.
Don't sell the skin before you've caught the bear. I'm not out just yet.
Don't count your chickens before they're hatched. I'm still in it to win it!
So I'm the first one to be completely topless... I see how it is. No need to gawk at me.
Alright you two, whatever happens now, keep it to yourselves.
In class, they make us wear that dress really tight. I much prefer the sports gear, it's all loose.
That dress gets so stiff when we have to sit in lecture halls all day.
Oh yeah, it's definitely easier to move around without my dress on.
Ah! The feeling of freedom when you get out of armor!
Feels good to be free, you know?

I can't imagine having to wear a corset all day - it'd be so hard to move around in.
You brought a shield with you? What, were you expecting to get in a fight tonight?
You brought a shield to a poker game? Were you expecting to get in a fight or something?
Oh wow, a wristwatch! I've only heard of nobles that have one of those!
Hey, house underwear are great! They're perfect for training, and still look decent.

Hey, house underwear are great! They're perfect for training, and still look decent.
The house underwear would make for some nice training clothes - but people get mad if I wear nothing but them...
Demacian armor... I'll have to try some on one day! It looks well made.
A Demacian battlesmith... sounds like just the kind of person who'd make good armor. I'll have to get my hands on a set myself one day!
I'll be honest, I don't know what a 'Faunus' is. If you are one, you look fine to me!
I'll be honest, I don't get what you're making a fuss about, Blake.
I don't know what you're making a fuss about, Blake. Your ears look fine to me, even if they are cat ears.
Oh... cat ears? Is that a thing where you come from?
That's a pretty cute looking cape. A lot of mages I know like to wear them.
Pulling down only half of your outfit feels like cheating...
And you were doing so well, ~target~!

Then again, I can't fault you for bringing one if it gives you an edge.
Looks like you're out! I told you I wouldn't go down easily.
So, it's come to this? Looks like I had nothing to worry about.
Putting on a show, just for me, ~name~?
Just you and me, ~name~. This is pretty exciting!
Wow, you must be terrible at this game, ~name~.
I wasn't really sure but... you really have to go at it, don't you?
Wow, you're... going straight into it, aren't you?
Well, looks like you're out!
You're out, ~name~. Looks like it's finally your turn.
Looks like it's your turn, ~name~. About time, too.
First me, now ~name~... this is pretty exciting.
About time you joined me, ~name~. Put on a good show.
(Wow, seeing ~name~ lose is getting my blood pumped!)
(Wow, knowing ~name~ lost before me... it's great!)
Do we need to watch? Or are we supposed to ignore what's going on?
I haven't really seen guys do this before. I mean, I haven't watched anyone- never mind.
~name~... would it be alright if I look, every now and again?
Is it alright if I look, ~name~? Actually, never mind.
(So, that's now ~name~ does it. That's... really hot.)

It's a shame I'm not enjoying this - well, not as much as I could have.
It's too bad you're putting on a performance now, and I'm already finished.

I thought it would get bigger when you started playing with it...

Too bad you can't... I dunno, go to a blacksmith and upgrade your 'sword'.
Sorry ~name~, I can't really get excited over something like that...
I can't even pretend to be excited about what you've got going on, ~name~...

Keep going, ~name~. Keep going.

Wow, ~name~ is really getting into it.

At least I can still enjoy the view.
Keep going, ~name~. Let's get it over with.
I guess ~name~'s still having fun, even if it's hard to tell...

You should pace yourself, ~name~. No need to pull it right off.
I think this is my favorite part of the night!
Wow, ~name~ is really going at it.

A healing spell? So nice of you!
Well, that was quite a show.

I suddenly wonder... how often they clean this place up?
Okay, that was hot, but, it's everywhere!

Well, that was one hell of a show!
That sure was a show. Are you always that dramatic when you're alone?
Wow, that's some bad luck for you, ~name~.
I wasn't really sure but... you really have to go at it, don't you?
Are you okay with us watching? Or should we just... leave you be?
Looks like ~name~ is out! Too bad.

Well, worse things could've happened. Care to join me, ~name~?

I wasn't expecting to have to watch other girls doing this, but here we are.

Don't over-think it. Just have fun, ~name~.

You certainly know how to go at it, ~name~.
I guess you're having a good time, ~name~?

We'll do this together, ~name~.
You and me, ~name~. Just keep going.

I guess I have something new to learn...

Wow, ~name~ is really going at it.

Wow... that felt so good!
Wow... that felt absolutely great!
